Thresh.name: ThreshБ
Thresh.title: Ббthe Chain WardenБ
Thresh.lore:
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйThresh is a twisted reaper whose hungry chains ensnare the souls of the living. A moment's hesitation at the sight of his ghostly visage and there is no escape. He leaves in his wake hollow corpses, their souls ripped loose and trapped in the sickly green light of his lantern. The Chain Warden takes sadistic joy in tormenting his victims, both before and after their deaths. His grim task is never complete, and he stalks the land for ever more resolute spirits to unravel.ЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзThresh carves careful, deliberate paths through Valoran. He handpicks his targets individually, devoting his full attention to each soul in turn. He isolates and toys with them, gradually eroding their sanity with his twisted, maddening humor. Once Thresh takes an interest in a soul, he does not relent until he possesses it. He then drags those he captures back to the Shadow Isles for an unimaginably dreadful fate. This is his only purpose.ИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдLittle is known about the Chain Warden's past, and many of the details live only in nursery rhymes and campfire tales. They tell of a sadistic jailer from centuries past who took great delight in torturing his wards. Patient and brutal, he used a variety of methods to break his victims' minds before their bodies succumbed to his grisly designs. Chains were the jailer's preferred instruments of terror. Their shrill scrape marked his dreadful approach and promised agony to those he visited. His dark reign went unchallenged until his prisoners escaped during a massive riot. They overwhelmed him, and without ceremony or remorse, hanged him from his own chains. Thus began the unlife of the horrible specter known as Thresh, or so the tales go.ЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюThresh now haunts the land, leaving an aftermath of horror and despair. However, there is a devious purpose behind his dark machinations, and the meager spirits of average men are insufficient. He seeks stronger souls. Only when he has broken the wills of Valoran's most resilient warriors will he finally have what he needs.ЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖж''There are few things as invigorating as taking a mind apart, piece by piece.''жЖдДгГбБ
Б-- ThreshБ
Thresh.blurb: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйThresh is a twisted reaper whose hungry chains ensnare the souls of the living. A moment's hesitation at the sight of his ghostly visage and there is no escape. He leaves in his wake hollow corpses, ...
allytips: БбГгДдЖжЗзCommunication is key when making use of Thresh's lantern.  Let your teammates know how you like to use it.ИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжDeath Sentence and Flay can be combined in either cast order for powerful combinations.ЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлThresh can collect souls without needing to kill units himself.  Planning your map position to be near the most deaths will help to maximize soul collection.ЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
enemytips: БбГгДдЖжЗзThresh's Death Sentence has a long cast time.  Watch for the cast to begin to take evasive actions.зЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗIntentionally breaking a wall of The Box can allow a vulnerable ally to escape unscathed.ЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжStanding on top of Thresh's lantern will deny his allies the ability to use it.жЖдДгГбБ

spells.name: БбDeath SentenceБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцThresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him.  Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.ЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip:
БбГгДдGrab an enemy, then pull them to you or leap to them.ДгГбБ
БбГThrows out his scythe, dealing ГбБ{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})БбГгДдЖж magic damage to the first unit hit and pulling them toward him for 1.5 seconds. жЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдReactivate this ability to pull Thresh to the bound enemy.дДгГбБ

spells.name: БDark PassageБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиThresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage.  Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.ЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip:
БбГгДдCreate a shielding lantern that an ally can use to dash to you.ЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиThrow the Lantern to a point. If an ally near the Lantern clicks it, they pick it up and Thresh pulls both back to him.иИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗAdditionally, allies who come near it gain a shield lasting 4 seconds that absorbs up to ЗжЖдДгГбБ{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})БбГгДд damage. Allies can only receive the shield once per cast. дДгГбБ

spells.name: FlayБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖSweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.ЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip:
БPassive: БDeal Б{{ f1 }}-{{ f2 }}БбГгДд magic damage on each hit that builds up when not attacking.дДгГбБ
БбГгДдThis value is equal to total souls collected plus up to ДгГбБ{{ e3 }}%БбГгДдЖ of Attack Damage, based on the amount of time since his last attack.ЖдДгГбБ

БActive: ББбГгДдKnock nearby enemies in the direction of your choice.ДгГбБ
Deals Б{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})БбГгДдЖжЗзИи magic damage in a line beginning behind him. Enemies hit are pushed in the direction of the swing, then slowed by ИзЗжЖдДгГбБ{{ e2 }}Бб% for 1.5 seconds.бБ

БбГгCast forward to push; cast backward to pull.ДгГбБ

spells.name: The BoxБ
spells.description: БбГгДдA prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.ДгГбБ
spells.tooltip:
БбГгДдTrap enemies inside walls that slow and deal damage if broken.дДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗзCreates a prison of spectral walls around himself. Enemy Champions who walk through a wall suffer зЗжЖдДгГбБ{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})БбГ magic damage and are slowed by ГбБ{{ e3 }}БбГг% for 2 seconds, but break that wall. гГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛOnce one wall is broken, remaining walls deal half damage and apply half slow duration. An enemy cannot be affected by multiple walls simultaneously.ЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

passive.name: БDamnationБ
passive.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИThresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him armor and ability power.ИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
